viral.title: What's Your Love Language?
viral.subtitle: Try it with your partner and deepen your connection!

amazonKeywords.WORDS: words of affirmation, compliments, encouragement, emotional communication

guide.purpose: This test helps you understand your preferred way of giving and receiving love and affection. This is a self-awareness tool only, not a diagnostic assessment.
guide.instruction: Read each of the 25 statements below and rate how much you agree with each on a 5-point scale. Consider which expression of love and affection most moves your heart in relationships.
guide.interpretation: Words: You feel loved through compliments and encouragement | Quality Time: Meaningful moments together matter most | Gifts: Thoughtful presents symbolize love | Acts of Service: Actions speak louder than words | Physical Touch: Physical intimacy makes you feel loved

WORDS.name: Words of Affirmation
WORDS.detail: You feel loved through compliments, encouragement, and grateful words. Your partner's kind words brighten your entire day.
WORDS.tip: üí° Regularly express to your partner specifically what you appreciate and how you feel about them.

TIME.name: Quality Time
TIME.detail: Quality moments together are your most treasured gift. Genuine conversation and shared experiences fill your emotional cup.
TIME.tip: üí° Create regular moments where you put your phone away and have deep conversations with your partner.

GIFTS.name: Receiving Gifts
GIFTS.detail: You feel loved through thoughtful gifts. They represent tangible evidence that your partner thinks of you and values you.
GIFTS.tip: üí° Even small, inexpensive gifts can be deeply meaningful if they show you were on their mind.

SERVICE.name: Acts of Service
SERVICE.detail: You feel loved through your partner's helpful actions. When they help shoulder your burden, you experience genuine care.
SERVICE.tip: üí° Anticipate your partner's needs and actively help before being asked‚Äîthis shows real care.

TOUCH.name: Physical Touch
TOUCH.detail: You feel loved through hugs, hand-holding, and physical closeness. Physical intimacy is your emotional anchor.
TOUCH.tip: üí° Don't hesitate to express your need for physical affection‚Äîit's a valid and beautiful form of connection.

ranges.description: You value all five love languages equally. You're flexible and can both give and receive love in multiple ways.
recommendation: Share your primary love languages with your partner
Expressing love in various ways enriches your relationship
Appreciate that your partner may show love differently than you prefer

ranges.description: You prefer 1-2 specific love languages. When expressed this way, you feel most deeply loved.
recommendation: Clearly communicate your primary love languages to your partner
When matched, these languages create deep connection
Learn and respect your partner's love language preferences too

ranges.description: You have a strong preference for one specific love language. This is your most powerful emotional connector.
recommendation: Help your partner understand your primary love language
Gradually explore value in other love languages
